preferences.name: instanceUrl
preferences.title: n8n Instance URL
preferences.description: Full URL of your n8n instance (e.g., https://n8n.example.com)

preferences.name: apiKey
preferences.title: n8n API Key
preferences.description: Your n8n API Key (User Settings -> API Keys)

commands.name: search-workflows
commands.title: Search Workflows
commands.subtitle: n8n
commands.description: Search and execute workflows via Desktop App.

commands.name: search-webhook-workflows
commands.title: Search Triggerable Webhooks
commands.subtitle: n8n
commands.description: Search and trigger workflows that start with a webhook.

commands.name: run-saved-command
commands.title: Run Saved n8n Command
commands.subtitle: n8n
commands.description: Run a previously saved webhook trigger configuration.

commands.name: reset-storage
commands.title: Reset n8n Extension Storage
commands.subtitle: n8n
commands.description: Reset all storage data for the n8n extension. Use this if you're experiencing issues.

scripts.prepublishOnly:
echo "

It seems like you are trying to publish the Raycast extension to npm.

If you did intend to publish it to npm, remove the \`prepublishOnly\` script and rerun \`npm publish\` again.
If you wanted to publish it to the Raycast Store instead, use \`npm run publish\` instead.

" && exit 1
